thread.section_title: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pets Best Pet Health Insurance | petsbest.com
thread.title: Jane Schneer
thread.title_full: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance reviewed by Jane Schneer

author: Jane Schneer
title: Jane Schneer
text: Pets Best has been a lifesaver for me for many years. Since being a member, I've never had to be in the position of forfeiting my pets' health because I couldn't afford treatment. And I especially appreciate the service I get from Pets Best. Claims are easy to submit, payment is prompt, and if you ever need to talk with someone, their reps are pleasant and helpful. I can't say enough about Oets Best!
